home.enlaceClick: Click here if you don't know the code

empresa.contenido: We are a company dedicated in facilitating the purchase of spare parts for all types of machinery to our customers in developing countries. With humble beginnings in Bolivia today our services reach divers countries and industries.
empresa.contenido2: Our drive for great customer service has allowed our customers to find, quote, compare, and buy their spare parts with a hassle free and one stop experience.
empresa.contenido3: Our systems allow us to offer over 250,000 spare parts, from over 50 different suppliers, with both local and international partners. You simple choose what you need and we take care of the rest.
empresa.contenido4: No more multiple calls, suppliers, order minimums, or problems.

span.a2: Excavators, Bulldozers, tractors, motor graders, loaders, etc.

tutorial.descripcion: We invite you to watch our selection for videos which will teach you how to access different free online parts manuals and get the most out of Dax Parts.
tutorial.columna1Texto: You can access to user's manual for free.
tutorial.columna2Texto: We can show you easily and quickly.
tutorial.enlaceTutorial: Click here to go to our tutorials.

contacto.contenido: We enjoy knowing and talking with our customers. Start by sending us a quick email or call, will make sure to contact you.
contacto.contenido2: Don’t see a local office in your country? No problem, just contact our headquarters in the USA.

aprender.contenido: Our sales system allows us to offer more than 250,000 spare parts, from 50 different manufacturers and a network of local and international partners. You enter your part number (if you do not know it, we will help you find it) and our search engine will offer you the best options. We offer you spare parts of all brands, from the best stores in Bolivia and the world. Caterpillar, John Deere, Komatsu, Case, New Holland, Kubota, Volvo, Cummins, Iveco and many more.

cotizacion.notaTexto: OEM names, logos and part numbers are used for reference. We do not imply that our products or services are affiliated with, sponsored or endorsed by the original equipment manufacturers.
cotizacion.beneficio3: ✓ Access to thousands of used and refurbished spare parts
